text: At War as at War () is a 1968 Soviet war movie directed by Viktor Tregubovich.На войне как на войне It stars Mikhail Kononov, Oleg Borisov, and Victor Pavlov. == Actors == * Mikhail Kononov as Alexander Alexandrovich Maleshkin * Oleg Borisov as Mikhail Domeshek * Victor Pavlov as Grigory Shcherbak * Fyodor Odinokov as Osip Byankin * Boris Tabarovsky as Bezzubtsev * Mikhail Gluzsky as Col. Day == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1968 movies Category:Soviet war movies
title: At War as at War
